text: Shin Hae-chul (6 May 1968 – 27 October 2014), also known by the nicknames Demon Lord (마왕) and Cult Leader (교주), was an avant-garde South Korean pop music performer. He was known for being a member of the pop group N.EX.T. Hae- chul died in Seoul, South Korea from a heart attack, aged 46.Renowned pop singer Shin Hae-chul dies, Korea Times, Retrieved on October 27, 2014 ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Singers from Seoul
title: Shin Hae-chul
